name: Professor Frippel's Special Invention Show
description:
Frippel, Professor banned from the Scientific Community, has something to show...his incredible invention will surely change the world!...or so he thinks. But alas, the results will not be so nicely appreciated!

-----------------------------------

This game was made for the Mini Jam 15 Technology and a limited palette as restriction #minijam15

Music from GreenWyvern/Vincent Wright
